channel.title: One-Line on Daniel Dominguez Chavez
channel.description: Recent content in One-Line on Daniel Dominguez Chavez

item.title: Greeley and Hansen, Chicago IL, 2019
item.description: Main Roles At Greeley Hansen, my title was Electrical Engineering intern. Greeley and Hansen is a specialized consulting business that designs water and wastewater systems for mostly public clients. In not fluffy terms, we designed the buildings, pumps, and motor control systems that manage waste and water. Revit AutoCAD Power analysis Day to Day My mentor was the Controls and Instrumentation Engineer Bart L. Godziejewicz. My day usually began by taking two trains from the south side of Chicago, then walking to our high-rise, which was a block away from Willis Tower or Chase Tower if you are old-school.
